title: [Talon Isle, Beach Lagoon]
description: A pristine lagoon graces the beach, separated from the sea by a slender barrier of white sand and black rock.  Astonishingly clear waters teem with small fish with scales that catch the sunlight like cut gemstones.  Small palms shade the lagoon, fronds swaying on the ocean breeze, smaller cousins to the huge coconut palm trees looming at the edges of the jungle populating the highland to the east.
